product_plan.tagline: Find your flow, one pomodoro at a time.
product_plan.target_audience: Students, remote workers, and anyone looking to improve their focus and productivity through the Pomodoro Technique.  Specifically targeting users who prefer a clean, simple, and distraction-free interface.
mvp_features: Simple Pomodoro timer with customizable work and break intervals (25/5 minutes as default).
Clear visual timer display with progress bar.
Notification alerts for work and break periods (optional customizable sounds).
Session tracking to monitor productivity over time.
